Episodes.Title: When You're Lost in the Darkness
Episodes.Actors: Pedro Pascal, Bella Ramsey, Nico Parker
Episodes.Plot: Twenty years after a fungal outbreak ravages the planet, survivors Joel and Tess are tasked with a mission that could change everything.

Episodes.Title: Infected
Episodes.Actors: Pedro Pascal, Bella Ramsey, Anna Torv
Episodes.Plot: After escaping the QZ, Joel and Tess clash over Ellie's fate while navigating the ruins of a long-abandoned Boston.

Episodes.Title: Long, Long Time
Episodes.Actors: Pedro Pascal, Bella Ramsey, Anna Torv
Episodes.Plot: When an unknown person approaches his compound, survivalist Bill forges an unlikely connection. Later, Joel and Ellie seek Bill's guidance.

Episodes.Title: Please Hold to My Hand
Episodes.Actors: Pedro Pascal, Bella Ramsey, Lamar Johnson
Episodes.Plot: After abandoning their truck in Kansas City, Joel and Ellie attempt to escape without drawing the attention of a vindictive rebel leader.

Episodes.Title: Endure and Survive
Episodes.Actors: Pedro Pascal, Bella Ramsey, Lamar Johnson
Episodes.Plot: While attempting to evade the rebels, Joel and Ellie cross paths with the most wanted man in Kansas City. Kathleen continues her hunt.

Episodes.Title: Kin
Episodes.Actors: Pedro Pascal, Bella Ramsey, Lamar Johnson
Episodes.Plot: After ignoring the advice of locals, Joel and Ellie descend deeper into dangerous territory in search of the Fireflies - and Tommy.

Episodes.Title: Left Behind
Episodes.Actors: Pedro Pascal, Bella Ramsey, Storm Reid
Episodes.Plot: As Joel fights to survive, Ellie looks back on the night that changed everything.

Episodes.Title: When We Are in Need
Episodes.Actors: Pedro Pascal, Bella Ramsey, Scott Shepherd
Episodes.Plot: Ellie crosses paths with a vengeful group of survivors - and draws the attention of its leader. A weakened Joel faces a new threat.

Episodes.Title: Look for the Light
Episodes.Actors: Pedro Pascal, Bella Ramsey, Merle Dandridge
Episodes.Plot: A pregnant Anna places her trust in a lifelong friend. Later, Joel and Ellie near the end of their journey.
